title: Fed rate hikes hitting consumers in the wallet
text:
Fed rate hikes hitting consumers in the wallet   01:55 
In his first policy-setting meeting since becoming Federal Reserve chairman, Jerome Powell raised interest rates and indicated more or on the way, which means borrowers should expect to pay even more for loans. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
In his first policy-setting meeting since becoming Federal Reserve chairman, Jerome Powell raised interest rates and indicated more or on the way, which means borrowers should expect to pay even more for loans.
